message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. My initial offer is $1800000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1400000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1400000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. My counteroffer is $1600000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1500000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
